missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent hiding places. A hero can interact with a mission token to investigate the hiding place.
{-} Do not deploy the Rebel Trooper figures to the map. They are hidden in the hiding places.
{-} A Rebel Trooper can escape through the entrance.
{-} When 2 Rebel Troopers have escaped through the entrance, select the entrance and click "Troopers escape" to end the mission with a Rebel win.
{-} The Rebels lose when 2 Rebel Troopers have been defeated, or when all heroes are wounded. When 2 Rebel Troopers have been defeated, select the entrance and click "Troopers defeated" to end the mission with a Rebel defeat.
missionProperties.startingObjective: Investigate the hiding places to find Gideon's old comrades.
missionProperties.repositionOverride: Block access to the mission tokens.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

Rumors of the traitor have proven true. You arrive in the system under attack, barely able to disengage from Imperial fighters. You're safely dropped off near the rendezvous point.

Imperial forces crawl throughout the area; there are no signs of Gideon's former comrades.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent hiding places. A hero can interact with a mission token to investigate the hiding place.
{-} Do not deploy the Rebel Trooper figures to the map. They are hidden in the hiding places.
{-} A Rebel Trooper can escape through the entrance.
{-} When 2 Rebel Troopers have escaped through the entrance, select the entrance and click "Troopers escape" to end the mission with a Rebel win.
{-} The Rebels lose when 2 Rebel Troopers have been defeated, or when all heroes are wounded. When 2 Rebel Troopers have been defeated, select the entrance and click "Troopers defeated" to end the mission with a Rebel defeat.

The reunion between Gideon and his comrades begins with awkward apologies. After, however, drinks and stories begin to flow, and old friendships are mended.

Through the course of the long evening, many of Gideon's exploits are revealed: more information than you ever wished to know about your companion.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Gideon receives the "Fearless Leader" Reward card.
{-} Heroes receive Rebel Troopers as allies.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

Gideon mourns the loss of his comrades as you depart. He rubs his leg; you recall that it's an old wound. He doesn't speak at all during the return journey.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.mainText:
You start to search for traces of Gideon's comrades.

Test {J} and enter the number of successes. Apply +1 {B} to the test for each strain token on the hiding place.

inputList.theText:
You are soon distracted by Imperial blaster fire. You need to keep searching.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the token for each {B} result gained.

events.eventText:
You search only for a few moments when a Zabrak wearing the badges of a battle medic appears from behind a tree and approaches you, obviously relieved.

"Good to see you, Commander", the Zabrak says. "Here, let me take care of your wounds."

He starts patching you up.

{-} Replace the mission token with 1 Rebel Trooper figure. 
{-} A hero within 3 spaces of the Rebel Trooper recovers 5 {H}.
{-} Apply additional Health equal to the threat level to the Rebel Trooper. The Rebel Trooper cannot use more than 1 action to perform a move during each activation.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: This appears to be a good hiding place.

{-} The Rebel Troopers are hidden in the hiding places.

eventActions.shortText: Find the remaining Troopers and help them escape.

eventActions.tbText: The joy of the reunion is interrupted as more Imperial forces rush towards the clearing.

events.eventText:
You have been searching for a while when a grizzled human woman in camouflage drops from a tree, smiling grimly. "About time, Commander", she growls. "That was almost too late."

She points towards a nearby mound. "Careful, this place is crawling with imps. This is a great fire position."

{-} Replace the mission token with 1 Rebel Trooper figure. 
{-} Apply additional Health equal to the threat level to the Rebel Trooper. The Rebel Trooper cannot use more than 1 action to perform a move during each activation.
{-} The active hero, if any, may interrupt to perform a move or an attack.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: This appears to be a good hiding place.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent hiding places. A hero can interact with a mission token to investigate the hiding place.

eventActions.shortText: Find the remaining Troopers and help them escape.

eventActions.tbText: The scout suddenly pauses and listens. "Trouble ahead, Commander", she says. Suddenly, a burst of static is heard, and the scout dives for cover as a Probe Droid appears, firing at her.

events.eventText:
After a few moments of searching, you happen upon a scarred Devaronian standing next to a couple of Stormtrooper bodies, leaning on a blaster rifle. "Thought you forgot about us, Commander", he says. "You have some nerve sho- WATCH OUT!"

The Devaronian jerks his rifle up and shoots at someone behind you.

{-} Replace the mission token with 1 Rebel Trooper figure. 
{-} Apply additional Health equal to the threat level to the Rebel Trooper. The Rebel Trooper cannot use more than 1 action to perform a move during each activation.
{-} The Rebel Trooper becomes <color="red">Focused</color>. Then he may perform an attack.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: This appears to be a good hiding place.

{-} Neutral mission tokens represent hiding places. A hero can interact with a mission token to investigate the hiding place.

eventActions.shortText: Find the remaining Troopers and help them escape.

eventActions.tbText: A sense of dread fills you as you hear the distant noises of approaching Imperial reinforcements.

events.eventText:
You are relieved to find Gideon's former right-hand man alive, but the human male appears to be talking into an Imperial comlink. As he notices you, he pauses, then shrugs.

"A shame, Commander", he says, raising a blaster pistol at you. "I kind of liked you, you know?"

{-} Replace the mission token with an <color="red">Imperial Officer</color>.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: This appears to be a good hiding place.

eventActions.tbText:
The traitor fires in your direction.

{-} The <color="red">Imperial Officer</color> moves 3 to attack {rebel}.

events.eventText: The Imperial forces intensify their search.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: This appears to be a good hiding place, but Imperial forces are closing in.
This appears to be a good hiding place, but Imperial forces are closing in.
This appears to be a good hiding place, but Imperial forces are closing in.
This appears to be a good hiding place, but Imperial forces are closing in.

events.eventText: You have found all of Gideon's old comrades. All that is left to do is cover their escape.

events.eventText:
Imperial search parties swarm over the clearing, systematically combing through the hiding places.

Choose one of the remaining hiding places, click on it and click "Imperial Raid".

A Zabrak wearing the badge of a battle medic stumbles out of his hiding place, charred by blaster fire.

{-} Replace the mission token with 1 Rebel Trooper figure. 
{-} Apply additional Health equal to the threat level to the Rebel Trooper. The Rebel Trooper cannot use more than 1 action to perform a move during each activation.
{-} This figure suffers {H} equal to the threat level and is <color="red">Stunned</color>.

events.eventText:
Imperial forces surround a human male, who immediately raises his hands. Just as it appears as if he is about to be cut down, though, he displays an Imperial badge. Apparently, the rumors about a traitor were correct.

{-} Replace the mission token with an <color="red">Imperial Officer</color>

translatedEntityProperties.theText: This appears to be a good hiding place.

mapEntities.mainText:
Deploy the heroes here.

Rebel Troopers can escape through the entrance. When 2 Rebel Troopers have escaped, click "Troopers escape" below to win the mission for the Rebels.

When 2 Rebel Troopers have been defeated, click "Troopers defeated" to end the mission with a defeat.
